com.accenture.fers.service

Interface VisitorFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VisitorService

    public interface VisitorFacade
    VISITORFACADE INTERFACE for defining abstract for VISITORSERVICEIMPLEMENTATION
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Accenture Technology Solutions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int changePassword(Visitor visitor)
      This service updates the visitor password
      boolean createVisitor(Visitor visitor)
      This service creates a new Visitor if the visitor already exists returns false else it creates the visitor and returns true
      void registerVisitorToEvent(Visitor visitor, int eventid)
      This service register a Visitor to an event: if the visitor is already registered or the event doesn't have any available seat its throws a ServiceException the method increases the number of available seats of the event after the register
      Visitor searchUser(Visitor visitor)
      This method search a Visitor by username and test if the new password is correct
      boolean searchUserName(java.lang.String userName)
      This method check if exits a visitor with the username provided
      java.util.Set<Event> showRegisteredEvents(Visitor visitor)
      This method gets the list of registered events for the visitor
      void unregisterVisitorToEvent(Visitor visitor, int eventid)
      This service unregister a Visitor to an event and increases the number of available seats of the event
      int updateVisitorDetails(Visitor visitor)
      This service updates the visitor information
